long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Gone are the days of staring at a 2009 website! PortalPlus is an extension developed to redesign the old-looking current version of the Dadeschools homepage. It allows for heavy customization as well as reducing some of the clutter and obsolete admin tools from the original portal.

PortalPlus lets you set a custom wallpaper for your dashboard as well as customize your color theme. It also moves all the important information to a more intuitive location, allowing you to open important links quicker.

Although it's still in development, PortalPlus will also offer many new features and expand far beyond just the student portal in the near future. Stay tuned!

FAQ:
➥ How do I change my wallpaper?
Click on the image icon on the top right.

➥ How do I change my theme color?
Click on the paintbrush icon on the top right.

Roadmap (Future features):
➥ Redesign Apps and Services tab
➥ Redesign main page
➥ Add functionality for Report Card, Scores and Info. buttons
➥ "Peek Original Page" button

𝐂𝐮𝐫𝐫𝐞𝐧𝐭 𝐯𝐞𝐫𝐬𝐢𝐨𝐧: 0.0.4
Patch notes:
➥ Sidebar link can now be opened in new tab
➥ W.I.P. "Apps and services" tab
➥ New wallpaper (Will not apply if you already have a custom wallpaper)
➥ Performance improvements

➥ Fixed "Welcome, William the IIIrd" placeholder text (lol)
➥ Fixed clipping issues
